scripts.dev:full: (bun run --filter @trading25/shared bt:sync || echo '[WARNING] bt:sync failed - continuing with existing types') && bun run dev:web
scripts.build: bun run build:clients && bun run build:shared && bun run build:web && bun run build:cli
scripts.test: bun run test:packages && bun run test:apps
scripts.test:packages: bun run --filter @trading25/shared test && bun run --filter @trading25/clients-ts test
scripts.test:apps: bun run --filter @trading25/cli test && bun run --filter @trading25/web test
scripts.test:backend: bun run test:packages && bun run --filter @trading25/cli test
scripts.test:coverage: bun run --filter @trading25/shared test:coverage && bun run --filter @trading25/clients-ts test:coverage && bun run --filter @trading25/cli test:coverage && bun run --filter @trading25/web test:coverage
scripts.clean: rm -rf packages/*/dist packages/*/node_modules node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml bun.lockb
scripts.typecheck:all: bun run typecheck && bun run --filter @trading25/clients-ts typecheck && bun run typecheck:web
